Key Match Events: David Fry hit a two-run home run in the seventh inning
Wenceel Perez hit an RBI in the sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Guardians staved off elimination at the hands of the surging Detroit Tigers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians will meet Saturday in Cleveland for a deciding Game 5
Others: The Yankees closed out the Kansas City Royals with a 3-1 victory in Game 4
The Yankees reinforced why they're the top seed in the AL
The Royals' tremendous season ended with a whimper
